data.description:
# üí• Daily Prize Drawüí• 

Beginning 24th May 2024, simply match play a game during set hours to be entered into a prize draw for a $10 USD (or local currency equivalent) Amazon Gift Card! üí∞ 

One winner will be chosen at random every day.

The entry dates and times are as follows:

**üóìÔ∏è 24th May 2024 - 31st May 2024: 8pm - 11pm CST (UTC-5)**

**üóìÔ∏è 1st June 2024 - 7th June 2024: 8pm - 11pm CET (UTC+2).**

# Key Features:

# - Team-Based Multiplayer: Engage in 4v4 high-stakes battles, utilizing strategy, skill, and teamwork.
{1226937125357334}

# - AI Companion - Blitzmon: Partner with Blitzmon for tactical support and abilities.
{327971420036476}
# - Pilot the Colossus: Command a customizable gigantic combat robot to gain advantage.
{1157046625449936}
# - Varied Play Modes: From intense team battles to solo challenges, choose your game mode.
{753777436578583}
# - Customize Loadouts: Personalize your Blitzer and Blitzmon with special abilities and gear.
{1027802585371521}
# - Dynamic Arenas: Each arena, from Seoul-inspired cities to futuristic stadiums, offers unique strategies.
{802360625146044}
Select Your Role:
- Blitzers: Combatants with specialized abilities, employing tactics like stealth and technological interference.
- Blitzmons: AI robots with unique skills to support Blitzers.
- Colossus: A towering robot designed for both combat and strategic advantage.

Strike Rush invites you to prove yourself in an unparalleled competitive experience, blending cutting-edge gameplay with in-depth customization. 

The question remains: Will you rise to the challenge?
